solution_line_template: If Carlos has {carlos_cards} cards, Matias has {carlos_cards}-{matias_fewer} = <<{carlos_cards}-{matias_fewer}={matias_cards}>>{matias_cards} baseball cards.

Since Matias and Jorge have the same amount of baseball cards, the total number of cards the three have is {matias_cards}+{matias_cards}+{carlos_cards} =<<{matias_cards}+{matias_cards}+{carlos_cards}={total_cards}>>{total_cards} cards.
